name: Blasted Isle
description:
This is our teams entry for Ludum Dare 47. I'll add more later but very tired.

Theme was Stuck in a Loop so we made an action game that is super hard :)

You are a lone swashbuckling pirate lady doomed to keep fighting creatures and avoiding being blasted by cannon balls for all eternity. Fight and dodge your way through the looping isle, enemies get stronger and more numerous each loop you make.

Controls:

WASD- Movement 

MOUSE- Aim Direction

SPACEBAR- Dash

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - Shoot

Credit

PeteyChan - Programming, Art
Rick Murray - Art, Animation, Music
StinkoSupreme -Additional Art
